'''Earth Skin''', also referred to as '''''Minecraft Earth'' Skin''' or the '''Overworld Protector''', is a skin pack that consists of one skin themed after ''[[Minecraft Earth]]''. It was available for free by signing up for a newsletter about ''Minecraft Earth'' before December 2019.<ref>{{cite|url=https://earth.minecraft.net/en-us/sign-up|title=Minecraft Earth Email Updates|website=Minecraft.net|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20191006014205/https://earth.minecraft.net/en-us/sign-up}}</ref>

{{Quote|Experience actual globetrotting by taking a walk in this excellent Earth skin!
